snippet: President Obama and Mitt Romney meet tonight at Long Island’s Hofstra University for the second of three presidential debates.
abstract: President Obama and Mitt Romney meet tonight at Long Island’s Hofstra University for the second of three presidential debates.
lead_paragraph: President Obama and Mitt Romney meet tonight at Long Island’s Hofstra University for the second of three presidential debates. The Times’ live blog has real-time coverage, including analysis and fact-checking. Read more.
